entry.title: GWMDhananjaya/React-color-picker: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.
entry.content: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.

entry.title: Shairaaj/Swicall: Project focuses on a simple, lightweight website where users can: Sign up & log in using their Google account (but without fetching Google Contacts). Automatically fetch and store contacts from the user's device using the Contacts Picker API. Display saved contacts in a minimalistic table format with a copy button for easy access.
entry.content: Project focuses on a simple, lightweight website where users can: Sign up & log in using their Google account (but without fetching Google Contacts). Automatically fetch and store contacts from the user's device using the Contacts Picker API. Display saved contacts in a minimalistic table format with a copy button for easy access.

entry.title: zeeshan-shani/react-drag-and-drop-dnd-kit: This project demonstrates a drag-and-drop implementation in React using the @dnd-kit/core library. It mimics the functionality of a Jira-like board, where items (e.g., tasks or tickets) can be dragged and dropped between multiple containers. The implementation is lightweight, customizable, and supports touch devices out of the box.
entry.content: This project demonstrates a drag-and-drop implementation in React using the @dnd-kit/core library. It mimics the functionality of a Jira-like board, where items (e.g., tasks or tickets) can be dragged and dropped between multiple containers. The implementation is lightweight, customizable, and supports touch devices out of the box.
